label: Sahat's Hackathon Starter
description: Generate custom full-stack CRUD and easily enable / disable features in Hackathon Starter.

attributes.help: Allow users to login and link their Twitter account to your app. Includes dependencies & code to interface with the Twitter API to programatically read and write Tweets.

attributes.label: Tumblr API
attributes.help: Use the Tumblr API with Tumblr.js to read and write content to Tumblr blogs.

attributes.label: Web Scraping API
attributes.help: Include code for scraping websites using Cheerio.js - a fast, flexible, and lean implementation of core jQuery designed specifically for the server.

attributes.label: Clockwork SMS API
attributes.help: Use the Clockwork SMS API to send and receive SMS through your app.

attributes.label: Aviary API
attributes.help: Use the Aviary API to programatically edit and save images.

attributes.label: Lob API
attributes.help: Use Lob's API for USPS-certified address verification and to programmatically send personalized postcards and letters.

attributes.help: Use the Google Maps API to place markers on a map widget inside your app.

attributes.label: Chart.js + Alpha Vantage
attributes.help: Include Chart.js visualization with realtime and historical stock data and cryptocurrency feeds through Alpha Vantage

attributes.label: Google Analytics

attributes.label: Contact Form
attributes.help: Include code for a Contact Form that will send feedback via email.

attributes.help: Include code for a Status Page that monitors CPU & Memory usage

readme:
# codotype-hackathon-starter

A Codotype generator build around Sahat's Hackathon Starter

## Development Instructions

1. Install dependencies:

```
npm install
```

2. Run generator:

```
npm test
```

# # # # # #

label: Vue.js Simple Frontend
description: Instantly generate simple frontend applications backed by a local data-store

attributes.label: Deploy with Netlify

readme:
# Vue.js + Vuex + Bulma + Buefy Generator
Codotype generator for [Vue.js](https://vuejs.org/), [Vue Router](https://router.vuejs.org/), [Vuex](https://vuex.vuejs.org/), [Bulma](https://buefy.org/), & [Buefy](https://buefy.org/)
#### Built with [Codotype](https://codotype.org)

## Build Setup

### Install dependencies
```
npm install
```

### Serve with hot reload at localhost:8080
```
npm run dev
```

### Build for production with minification
```
npm run build
```

### Build for production and view the bundle analyzer report
```
npm run build --report
```

### Run unit tests
```
npm run unit
```

### Run e2e tests
```
npm run e2e
```

### Run all tests
```
npm test
```

For a detailed explanation on how things work, check out the guide and docs for vue-loader.

https://buefy.org/documentation/start
https://bulma.io/documentation/layout/container/

label: Express.js & MongoDB REST API
description: Instantly generate Web APIs with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Docker

option_groups.label: Deployment
option_groups.description: Configure the deployment options for your app

attributes.label: Generate Docker Compose files
attributes.help: Generate a Dockerfile in both the frontend and backend directories - deploy the whole stack with a single docker-compose up command.

option_groups.label: Documentation
option_groups.description: Configure the documentation options for your code

attributes.label: Generate APIDoc Documentation Headers
attributes.help: Whether or not generate APIDoc-compatible comment headers in your Express.js controllers

option_groups.label: API Action
option_groups.description: Add individual RESTful API actions to your models
option_groups.previewTemplate:
{{model.verb}} /{{ schema.identifier_plural }}/{{model.uri}} - {{ model.function_name }}()
{{model.verb}} /{{ schema.identifier_plural }}/:{{ schema.identifier }}_id/{{model.uri}} - {{ model.function_name }}()

attributes.label: Verb
attributes.help: The RESTful verb associated with this API Action

attributes.label: URI
attributes.help: The URL of this action (don't prefix with /)

attributes.label: Label
attributes.help: The label of this API Action

attributes.label: Function Name
attributes.help: The name of the function

attributes.label: Scope
attributes.help: The scope of the API Action

readme:
# Express.js + MongoDB API Generator
:ship: Codotype REST API generator for Node.js, Express, MongoDB, JSON Web Token, & Docker

## Getting Started
Express.js, Mongoose, ES6 Syntax is used in this project.

### Prerequisites
- [Docker](https://www.docker.com/)
- [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/)
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/)

### Install and Develop
1. Install dependencies with NPM:

```
npm install
```

2. Run the Docker containers for MongoDB and [Mongo-Express](https://github.com/mongo-express/mongo-express)

```
docker-compose up
```

3. Run the server in development mode:

```
npm run dev
```

### Documentation
Documentation is auto-generated from [APIDoc.JS](http://apidocjs.com). Build the documentation with the following command:

```
npm run apidoc
```

### Technologies used

- [Express.js](https://expressjs.com/)

- [Mongoose](http://mongoosejs.com/)

- [dotenv](https://www.npmjs.com/package/dotenv)

- [APIDoc.JS](http://apidocjs.com)

## License
[MIT License](http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT).
Built with [codotype](https://www.codotype.io/).
